details.description: How to take court action against someone who owes you money using the Money Claim Online (MCOL) website, how to register and where to get help making a money claim online
details.more_information:
##How to register

Select 'register as an individual' or 'register as an organisation' on the Money Claim Online home page. To register you'll need to enter your full name and provide a password.

##What you can claim for

You can use this service to claim:

- for a fixed sum under £100,000
- against no more than 2 people or organisations

^You can use the service from anywhere in the UK, but only against someone with an address in England and Wales.^

You will have to pay a [court fee](/court-fees-what-they-are "court fees"), using a debit or credit card.

##What you can't claim for

You can't use this service to get:

- [compensation for an accident or injury](/compensation-after-accident-or-injury/ "compensation after an accident or injury")
- your [tenancy deposit](/tenancy-deposit-protection/ "tenancy deposit") back from your landlord

##Help and advice

<mcol@hmcts.gsi.gov.uk>  
0845 601 5935  
01604 619 402
$C
details.introduction:
You can take court action against someone if they owe you money and won't pay you back.

Apply using your Government Gateway ID. If you don’t have one, register first using this service.
details.alternate_methods:
You can also apply by post.

You'll need to fill in a [claim form](http://hmctsformfinder.justice.gov.uk/HMCTS/GetForm.do?court_forms_id=338 "claim form"){:rel="external"} and return it to the address below with the correct [fee.](/make-court-claim-for-money/court-fees "fee"){:rel="external"}

$A County Court Money Claims Centre  

PO Box 527
Salford
M5 0BY $A

$C **County Court Money Claims Centre**   

**Telephone:** 0300 123 1372  
**Fax:** 0161 743 4023 $C
